short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the fiery spirit of Kyojuro Rengoku every time you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring the blazing passion of Kyojuro Rengoku to your browser’s new tab! Admire his fiery determination and unforgettable moments from Demon Slayer. Whether you’re a fan of his strength or his unyielding spirit, this extension will inspire you with Rengoku's presence each time you open a tab.
